definition: a gunshot from a concealed location, attack in speech or writing
details:
noun
- a gunshot from a concealed location
- Old or New World straight-billed game bird of the sandpiper family
verb
- attack in speech or writing
= synonyms: attack, assault, round, assail, lash out
- aim and shoot with great precision
= synonyms: sharpshoot
- hunt or shoot snipe
